Detailed Description

Rotary tool for the milling machine It must be possible to create both a 2d and a 3d representation of one of these tools.

Member Function Documentation

const TopoDS_Face & millTool::getProj ( degrees  deg  ) 

Projects the 3d model of the tool onto a plane normal to XY. Some code from http://www.opencascade.org/org/forum/thread_16928/ TODO: use param degrees

Parameters:
deg Projection angle, in degrees. Sign is ignored.
Returns:
the projection as a TopoDS_Face.
See also:
getProfile(), getRevol()
